name: Protect My Sister
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Laura Kinney → remove Protect My Sister from the game. [hazard]

name: Hellhound
text: Quickstrike. When Revealed: Exhaust your identity. (Weapon Hex’s nemesis minion.)

name: Save My Sister and Others
text: “If you are fast with your magic, mine is better.”—Hellhound Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Revealed: Each player searches their deck, discard pile and hand for a hero-specific ally and places it facedown beneath this scheme. When Defeated: Return each ally beneath it to its owner's hand.

name: Repressed Animosity
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Search Hellhound in the encounter deck and put her into play engaged with you. If you cannot, this card gains surge. When Revealed (hero): Hellhound attacks you. If Hellhound is not in play, this card gains surge.
